<!--- Remove sections that do not apply -->

This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to bitcoin-core.

General bitcoin questions and/or support requests and are best directed to the [Bitcoin StackExchange](https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com).

### Describe the issue
There seems to be a bug if you have a disconnect from the internet.
Most of the german internetproviders have an automatic 24h disconnect. Im running on 0.13.1 for three days now and after every reconnect it stucks with 8 connections and on bitnodes the node is showed open on check but on activation reported as down.
Restarting core solves the problem until the next reconnect.


### Machine specs:
- OS: Bananian
Banana PI M1

### Any extra information that might be useful in the debugging process.
This is normally the contents of a `debug.log` or `config.log` file. Raw text or a link to a pastebin type site are preferred.

I can provide the debug.log for help after working day is done
title: 0.13.1 reported down after Internet reconnect
